task.title: Assigning users and groups to policies
task.shortdesc: Policies can be assigned to users or groups. Policy configuration is done inside the policies.user.xml file.

step.cmd: Open the policies.user.xml file with a text or XML editor.
Ensure you are in the correct policy inside the file. Look for the line that begins with <policy id=”Your Custom Policy” .

info.p: Where “Your Custom Policy” is the name of the policy you wish to modify.

step.cmd: Inside the policy there is a tag called <policyAssignment> ending with <policyAssignment>. Enter your policy groups between these tags using: <assignment type=”1” id=”v11TestGroup”/>

info.note: When using Domino groups, they should be created as Multi-Purpose Groups.

info.p: Where the “v11TestGroup” is the name of your group.

step.cmd: Save and close the file when complete.
